[[inst_ld]]
==== LD

*Syntax:* ld [SrcL, SrcR<{.sw,.uw}><<<shamt>], ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Load 64-bit doubleword from memory.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_ld.svg[LD encoding,width=800]

*Group:* LDA/BASE_REG
